title: Advanced English 504
headline: This free online English course covers the present tense and provides idioms and vocabulary related to career planning.
description: This English course outlines helpful vocabulary related to career planning and explores some common expressions and idioms. We explain the grammar for the present tense and focus on using stative and modal verbs in this tense. We then examine adverbs commonly used with the present perfect tense and explain how to use the present tense to describe past actions. Sign up for this higher-level course to enrich your English grammar and vocabulary.
courseDescription:
This course introduces you to vocabulary related to career planning and explores various English idioms and expressions commonly used to discuss the working environment. We demonstrate how to add these expressions to your everyday conversations to boost your confidence and improve your pronunciation and understanding of the language.

The course then delves into two key grammar topics. First, we review the present tense in its various forms while focusing on using stative and modal verbs in this tense. Second, we study the uses of the present perfect and present perfect continuous tenses. We examine the grammar of combining adverbs with the present perfect tense and then show you how to use the present tense to describe past actions.

The course offers you a chance to test your knowledge and practice your new skills with activities in our 'Student Practice' and 'Resources' sections. We have designed these exercises to enhance your ability to read, write, and speak English. In addition, this course provides writing advice dedicated to helping you understand the required features and structure of narrative essays. Enrol in this course today to build on your English skills and become even more proficient in this universal language!
